runs.comm: back of a length, outside off. Looks like there's some bounce here. Warner bunts that down the pitch

missed run out! Back of a length again, but straighter. Warner pulls that into the legside and there's some hesitation as the batsmen go for two. Had Mathews collected the throw and broken the stumps, Finch would have been short.
back of a length again, Warner misses with his pull and they scamper a leg bye
shortish again, short-arm pulled into the leg side into a gap on the infield
wider this time and cut away behind point. Fielders reel it in though
angled across, play and miss on the drive
full, wide and angled across, Warner drives but the swing takes it away from the bat
full again, but tighter into the stumps. Warner defends into the off side
good length and straighter still. Warner is hit on the pads, but the ball was likely heading over the stumps. Might have pitched outside leg as well.
straight again, Warner gets bat on this one, hits to the legside,  and the batsmen run one

what a catch! Kulasekara's fine run continues. Finch moved across his stumps and tried to hit that through the leg side, but got a thick leading edge and Kushal Perera at short cover dived well in the air to his right to take a super catch.
good length on off stump, defended
wide of off stump again, and cut hard by Warner in front of square. Reeled in just short of the rope again
shortish outside off stump, and run off the face to third man
shot! Short outside off stump again and Warner bludgeons that cross-batted past the bowler to the short boundary
Mathews goes even shorter this time and bowls a bouncer. Warner hooks but doesn't time it.
this is a classy shot. Short again and this is the best of the cut shots. Not much room, but he times that well and splits the field in front of square. no chance of that being hauled in
shortish again, but Warner refrains from going after that one. Hit defensively into the off side
length ball on leg stump, Marsh knocks that into the leg side and the batsmen scamper through
slower ball, and Malinga gets Warner playing early. Was fullish on off stump, Warner drives but is through it early and spoons it wide of cover
fullish and wide, Warner gets the toe of his bat on that and Kulasekara comes in from third man to keep it to one
slower ball, length and on middle stump, defended into the off side
looking for the middle stump yorker there, but overpitches it slightly. Marsh whips that away to the deep fielder on the leg side
slower ball again, length on middle stump. Defended into the off side.
length ball on leg stump, hits Marsh on the pads and the batsmen take one. Might have got some bat on it
length on leg stump again, Warner turns that to the leg side and finds a gap
fullish, on leg stump again. Hits Marsh on the front pad
length ball on off stump this time, Marsh is forward to defend
slightly fuller, heading towards off stump. Marsh defends again
length on the stumps again, Marsh knocks it into the off side and the batsmen take a quick single as the field closes in to collect
slower ball from Malinga, length on the stumps. Marsh defends and gets a run into the off side
slower ball again, Warner reining his attacking instincts in against Malinga so far. Just gets bat on ball and takes a run into the offside infield
another slower ball, 133kph. Marsh expecting it to come quicker, and ends up just hanging his bat out in defence
again 113kph. Slightly shorter this time. Marsh blocks it again.
116 kph, not a quick ball yet in this over. Shorter and outside off stump, Marsh glides that off the face towards third man

an over of slower balls and almost a run out. Warner got a thick edge on a length ball outside off stump, and took off for a single, but was sent back quickly enough to beat the direct hit from short third man.
shortish and on off stump, bunted into the leg side
back-of-a-length at 131kph, Marsh is struggling here. Plays a cut at that one and misses

direct hit, and out! Marsh was clearly rattled there, and desperate to get off strike. Lenght outside off stump, Marsh defended that and took off, and the ball dribbled towards Dilshan, who swooped in and underarmed the throw, to beat Marsh back to the crease
length on the legs, turned around the corner
tried to smash that full delivery straight, but got a big inside edge and the batsmen have time for two, as fine leg runs into collect
shortish and wide. Warner cuts it square for one
length on the stumps, not much spin, defended into the leg side
got hold of that one! Full and pitched outside leg stump. Warner opens up his stance and hammers that high over long on
length ball on off stump, knocks it into the off side and scampers through
full and on off stump, driven to long on
fullish and on leg stump, Warner backs away a touch and plays that through the off side, where the short cover runs around to collect
slower, full and on the stumps, Bailey turns it around the corner towards short fine leg

almost another run out there! Bailey tried to pull that shortish delivery and only got an under edge. Thirimanne ran in from deep square leg, but his throw was off target, and Chandimal had too much to do. Another missed opportunity for Sri Lanka
135 kph, straight and full, blocked back to the bowler
wide and short, Bailey chases after that one but can't get bat to it
lovely stroke. Overpitched and Bailey strikes that high, straight and long beyond the sightscreen
shortish and off stump, Bailey tried to pull but missed and was hit on the thigh pad. Appeal from Perera, but it was too high.
Bailey pinpoints Dilshan with an open-faced drive. Poor stroke you've got to say. Fullish wide delivery, drilled straight to the fielder, who gobbles it at waist height.
length on off stump, Warner slogs that to long on
tossed up on off stump, hit wide of short cover
full again, and Warner cuts down on that one and gets it behind point
short and down leg, but not put away. Warner ends up playing a half-hearted pull that is fielded at short fine leg
not much spin there, but Voges misses a fullish delivery heading down leg
tossed up wider of Voges this time, but he's beaten by the flight and can't get bat to it
length outside off stump, hits Warner's pads and the batsmen run through
shortish outside off, Voges drags that to the leg side with a pull, but can't beat midwicket
fuller this time, Voges on-drives aerially, but it lands well short of long on
length outside off stump, Warner goes for a big heave and misses
big appeal, but I don't think that's touched bat. That leaps up from back of a length and hits Warner's bicep on the way through to Chandimal. S
good thinking,. Mathews goes back of a length on off stump again, and Warner backs away and directs that past short fine leg for four
fullish and straight, defended
shorter and outside off stump, run down to third man
Warner tries to cut that length delivery, but gets an under edge and they scamper through
another quick run. Voges hit that straight to cover and took off, but there was a misfield and an easy single in the end
short and pulled into the gap on the legside, Perera runs around to field
shortish and on offstump. Warner makes room and cuts that to deep point
slower ball, fullish and on the stumps, Warner wound up for a big shot, but ended up just knocking that through the off side
length ball, moved in a little off the seam. Voges inside edges it towards point
down the track and walloped. That's Warner's fifty. It's a full toss outside off stump and Warner smashed that in front of square
full and on the stumps, driven to long on
full again, driven to long off
full and wide, Warner drives that to the deep cover fieldsman
length outside leg stump, Warner backed away but could only get that to short third man
short and wide, Voges runs at it and cuts to the deep
Warner opens up again, but gets an outside edge to short third man and they take another quick run
full and angled into Voges, who misses the ball, and the keeper can't collect either
fullish again, bashed down the ground for a single
tossed up on the stumps, Voges hits that towards long on, and they run well as they complete two
shortish on the stumps and bludgeoned!
Mathews goes for a bouncer, which Warner somehow hits for six! He fell as he played that hook shot and it sailed high over the fine leg fence.
bowls that way down the leg side, Mathews is rattled
backs away a tad and hits a length ball on leg stump towards long on, who has work to do. Good running gets two again.
dropped! How much will that cost Sri Lanka? That was slogged across the line straight to Kulasekara at deep midwicket, but he can't hold on.
fullish and on the stumps, Voges gets a thick inside edge to fine leg
Warner backs away again and Mathews follows him. He aims a big swing at cow corner again, but the length ball travels under his bat and to the keeper
tossed up outside off, dragged to wide mid on
tries the switch-hit paddle sweep, but misses. Full and outside off stump from Mendis, who bowled that flatter and quicker
flat again and on leg stump, Warner tries to slog it but can't get enough bat on it. Dribbles into the on side
advances, and Mendis slows it up and bowls it shorter. Voges drags it to deep midwicket
fullish, driven down the ground to long off
length ball straightening on off stump, Voges pushes that to long off
slower ball again, that's seven in a row. Voges worked a length ball on the stumps behind square on the leg side, and a throw that deflects off the stumps allows a second
you guessed it, slower ball. Lenght on middle stump. Voges gets that to deep backward square
I think that was the quicker one this time, wide yorker, outside edge to third man
slower bouncer, Voges pulls it to deep backward square
wide yorker again, 141 kph, driven square by Warner to deep point
really wide full delivery there. Would have been a wide if Voges hadn't hit it, but he did. Throws his bat out, and hits it straight to backward point
full, outside off stump and Warner murders that over long off for six. It was a full toss in the end and Warner got right under neath it
full and straighter this time, driven right back past the bowler and more terrific running earns an extra run
wide full toss again, but Warner drills that on the ground to long off
slower ball, 100kph. Voges goes for a big slog, but is done in by the variation
slower again, and Voges swings hard at that, and gets enough bat to get it to long on
full and on off stump, Warner tries to drill that wide of long on, but a diving save from Mahela at midwicket keeps it to one
full and wide, Warner drills it hard to long off
full and wide of off stump, driven to long off
slides that yorker across Warner, who digs it out to cover
wide yorker again, driven to long off
Malinga's been pinpoint in this over. Yorker about a foot outside off stump, and Warner can only hit that to long off. He's broken Warner's bat too.

Voges goes across the stumps to try and throw Malinga's line off, but Malinga follows him and executes another perfect yorker. Dug out to the off side again. That's as good as death bowling gets really.
he gets his yorker humming early. Full on the stumps, and turned to leg, where the square leg fielder collects
another yorker on the stumps, Warner just digs it out to cover again
slightly overpitches that one, and an extra run is the result. Voges swings that behind square, and fine leg has to run around to cut it off
back on target with a yorker on leg stump, hits the boot, might have been some bat as well.

Warner runs down the pitch to alter the length and gets under a full toss. Great fielding at long off from Thisara Perara saves the boundary though. He ran in, dived to his right and managed to stop a full-blooded drive.

down the track again, but the bowler is wise to it and adjusts his length to york Warner. That's hit to cover again, and it has been some very good bowling in the final two overs to keep Australia below 140.
